mapper.insert: insert into employee ( employee_code, employee_name, address, phone_no, fk_department, is_active, created_date, created_by ) values ( #{employeeCode}, #{employeeName}, #{address}, #{phoneNo}, #{fkDepartment}, #{isActive}, #{createdDate}, #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: update employee set employee_code = #{employeeCode}, employee_name = #{employeeName}, address = #{address}, phone_no = #{phoneNo}, fax_no = #{faxNo}, fk_department = #{fkDepartment}, is_active = #{isActive}, changed_date = #{changedDate}, changed_by = #{changedBy} where pk_employee = #{pkEmployee}
